abstract: Time Warner‘s discussions to merge or sell its AOL Internet division with Microsoft or Yahoo have taken on new urgency ahead of Yahoo’s Aug. 1 shareholders meeting, a source familiar with the discussions told Reuters on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Time Warner‘s discussions to merge or sell its AOL Internet division with Microsoft or Yahoo have taken on new urgency ahead of Yahoo’s Aug. 1 shareholders meeting, a source familiar with the discussions told Reuters on Tuesday.

headline.main: AOL Talks with Microsoft or Yahoo Said to Pick Up
